√cāy 'note, observe'

present: [1.] cā́yati etc.  cā́yamāna  

perfect: cikyus  cacāya  cacāye  -cāyāṃ  cakrus  

aorist: [5.] acāyiṣam  acāyiṣṭa  

[future: cāyiṣyati  cāyiṣyate  cāyitā  ]

verbal: citá  cāyitvā́  -cā́yya  

secondary: passive: cāyyate  

derivatives: cāyanīya  cāyitṛ C.  cāyú RV.  -citi B.  

A form, but an early specialized one, of √2ci. The meanings 'reverence, be in awe' are rare and secondary.
